Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Murton Colliery, County Durham Promoted by Murton Colliery Brass Band Choice of test pieces: "Bohemian Girl", "Yeomen of the Guard", "Maritana", or "The Gondoliers" March contest: 1. Hartlepool Recreation, 2. Hetton Rechabites Prizes - 1st £6 and cornet, 2nd £4 nand trombone, 3rd £3, 4th £2.
April 9, 2012, 2:31 p.m. June 13, 2019, 9:39 a.m.

3 Hartlepool Recreation J. Byers Maritana [arr. Round]
4 Spennymoor Temperance R. H. Cooper Maritana [arr. Round]
